Well, the universe we know depends on these forces being as they are.=A0 B=
ut physics talks about a lot of other things (spacetime, for instance). I d=
on't think we want to go much deeper :-)

--- On Mon, 6/8/09, April Abercro=
mbie <april@...> wrote:

From: April Abercrombie <=
april@...>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
To: EV=
P-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 1:43 PM











    
 =
           
            


      
      


So everything can be defined as =
from one of 
these forces. Objects=A0from these forces can omit sound waves=
.
=A0
Does that sound like a correct statement? 
Just trying to get my mind=
 around it.
=A0

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: 
  Rj 
  To: EVP-I=
TC@yahoogroups .com 
  Sent: Monday, June 08, 2009 2:33 PM
  Subject: Re: [=
EVP-ITC] New ideas
  

  
  
  
    
    
      April, standard physics tod=
ay defines four fundamental 
        types of forces: electromagnetism, gra=
vity,=A0 and the strong and 
        weak interaction of elementary particl=
es.=A0 So while EM is one type 
        of energy (well, lets call it a for=
ce), there are a few others 
        too.

rombie <april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com>

          =

          
          This seems to jive with what I 
          have learne=
d this far, but I am still not certain I understand it 
          completel=
y.
          =A0
          I thought everything was based in 
          the=
 electromagnetic spectrum.
          =A0

---- 
          
            From: 
            Frank 
            Ratka 
 =
           To:

            .com

            Monday, June 08, 2009 2:05 PM

            Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
            

            
            =

            
              
              
                
              =
    Tell me where the seperation on the spectrum takes place 
             =
     between 300Hz and 300KHz. Yes, soundwaves cause pressure waves 
      =
            that our ears read as vibration and our mind translates as 
   =
               sound. The waves are still on the electromagnetic spectrum. =

                  Even subsonic geomagnetic waves are present on the scale=
. What 
                  I mean by power can be directll translated to vol=
ume or 
                  amplitude. The only thing that distinguishes soun=
dwaves from 
                  any other wave is the fact that we can hear =
them.
                  =A0
                  Frank R.

--- On Mon, 6/8/09,=
 Rj 
                  <rasterer@yahoo. com> wrote:

                  
Fro=
m: Rj 
                    <rasterer@yahoo. com>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New=
 
                    ideas
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Date: Monday, June=
 
                    8, 2009, 2:53 PM


                    
             =
       
                    
                    
                      
  =
                    
                        No. Sounds waves are not on th=
e 
                          electromagnet spectrum nor are they a form of =

                          electromagnet energy. Sound waves are based on 
=
                          pressure waves in the air (or in other 
         =
                 substances).=A0 Our ears detect these pressure 
          =
                waves and translate them into sounds we here.=A0 
         =
                 Our ear do NOT hear electromagnet energy.=A0 Our 
        =
                  eyes do: that part which we call visible 
               =
           light.



--- On Mon, 6/8/09, Frank 
                          R=
atka <warrior18eii@ yahoo.com> 
                          wrote:

         =
                 
From: 
                            Frank Ratka <warrior18=
eii@ 
                            yahoo.com>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New 
  =
                          ideas
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Date: 
       =
                     Monday, June 8, 2009, 12:38 PM


                     =
       
                            
                            
         =
                   
                              
                        =
      
                                
                                It =
sounds like she's saying "one, two, 
                                ....."=

                                =A0
                                A mist=
ake that a lot of people make is 
                                thinking =
that there are two different types of 
                                ener=
gy at work when it comes to sound waves and 
                              =
  electromagnetic waves. The only thing that 
                             =
   seperates them is frequency and power. Radio 
                          =
      waves are radio waves because they occupy a 
                        =
        certain block of the electromagnietic spectrum. 
                  =
              Sound waves exist on that same spectrum just 
               =
                 farther down with much longer waves. Soundwaves 
         =
                       and subsonic waves can penetrate almost anything 
  =
                              because of their wavelengths. The shorter the=
 
                                wavelength the more ways we can shield ag=
ainst 
                                them.
                              =
  =A0
                                Think of microwaves. These are also a=
 type 
                                of radio and telemetry transmitting =
wave but the 
                                waves also have a physical ef=
fect on our 
                                environment by causing molecul=
es to speed up, 
                                which creates heat. A litt=
le lower than this is 
                                IR or infrared it to=
o can cause physical objects 
                                to heat up bu=
t usually it just causes molecules 
                                to rota=
te in place. All physical things give off 
                                =
IR light. Its a way the total system conserves 
                           =
     energy by spontaneously emitting IR 
                                r=
adiation.
                                =A0
                             =
   Frank R.

rcrombie <april@abercrombiegh

 com> wrote:

                          =
      
                                
                                Her=
e is some 
                                food for thought. I am currently=
 reviewing my 
                                audio from our May 30th 
   =
                             investigation.
                               =
 =A0
                                It was me 
                           =
     and another girl teammate=A0present in the 
                          =
      room. I picked up a 3rd female voice on my 
                         =
       digital voice recorder that I carry with me. We 
                   =
             were standing right next to another digital 
                 =
               video recorder that I leave beside my night 
               =
                 vision camera. That recorder did not pick up 
            =
                    this 3rd voice. I have asked the girl that was 
       =
                         with me to check her recording to see if she 
    =
                            picked it up.
                                =
=A0
                                I have long 
                          =
      felt the true EVP does not come from sound waves 
                   =
             in the environment, or then it wouldn't be EVP, 
             =
                   but a disembodied voice. Somehow EVP's are 
            =
                    appearing directly on the 
                            =
    recordings.
                                =A0
                       =
         This 
                                instance with the recorders =
may back that theory 
                                up. That other record=
er should have picked that 
                                voice up if it =
were sound waves in the 
                                environment.
     =
                           =A0
                                I am 
      =
                          attaching the clip of this 3rd voice. 
          =
                      The=A0file that is named=A0"01-02-17 Clip" 
         =
                       is the full clip.=A0You will hear my voice as 
     =
                           I say "Yeah", and then another comes in right 
 =
                               after that. I think I know what it 
        =
                        says.
                                =A0
         =
                       Again, I was 
                                live m=
onitoring my audio, but still did not hear 
                               =
 this until playback. It isn't clear, so I am not 
                        =
        as excited about it as my one's from the last 
                    =
            investigation.
                                =A0
            =
                    =A0
                                
                  =
              ----- 
                                Original Message -----=
 
                                From: 
                                Fr=
ank Ratka 

                                To: 
                          =
      EVP-ITC@yahoogroups 
                                .com 
          =
                      Sent: 
                                Monday, June 0=
8, 2009 1:09 PM
                                Subject: 
                 =
               Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
                                

  =
                              
                                
           =
                     
                                
                    =
            
                                
                             =
   I have a running theory that EVP is carried 
                           =
     on an untrasonic wave and demodulated exactly 
                       =
         where they want it to manifest. It works off the 
                =
                heterodyne principle. If you mix two ultrasonic 
          =
                      waves that differ one another in frequency then 
    =
                            if you add or subtract them together you get a =

                                beat frequency or alternate frequency. For=
 
                                example, if a ghost is sending a signal a=
t 54KHz 
                                and you have an electric fan in a =
room creating 
                                an untrasonic frequency at 4=
5KHz then you will 
                                have a intermediate dif=
ference=A0frequency at 
                                9KHz, well within h=
uman hearing range (20Hz to 
                                20KHz). This w=
as just an example, but all 
                                electronic equ=
ipment generates ultrasonic 
                                signals just b=
y turning them on. From this 
                                theory I alwa=
ys felt that EVP were generated 
                                within a f=
ew inches of the recorder.
                                =A0
            =
                    We are able to reproduce this affect in not 
          =
                      only radio with superheterodyne systems but also 
   =
                             with acoustics and audio as in some passive 
 =
                               sonars and a commercial produce called the 
=
                                "audio spotlight" by Dr. Joseph Pompeii.
  =
                              =A0
                                Frank R.
=

t the 
                                EVP are often=A0not recorded by the =

                                microphone but somehow make their way in a=
t the 
                                actual=A0point where the storage is =
made, 
                                whether it be analog (tape) or 
    =
                            digital.=A0

                                So=
 much we don't know ...
                                =A0
               =
                 Zack

            playback.

     =
                           I am curious if anyone with a microphone 
      =
                          wired to a remote site has ever gotten any EVP 
 =
                               in real time.
                              =
  =A0
                                I=A0took part in=A0an investigation 
=
                                of Ashmore Estates, near Ashmore IL, on Sat=
urday 
                                night. We had six video cameras set =
up in the 
                                three halls of the building. The=
 video for 
                                all=A0was being monitored and 
=
                                recorded=A0at a central location. Alas, we =

                                did not have microphones at the camera sit=
es 
                                conected to the central location. I won=
der what 
                                we might have heard if we did?
  =
                              =A0
                                Zack

                      <td valign=3D"top">
                                <=
div>I have a running theory that EVP is carried 
                          =
      on an untrasonic wave and demodulated exactly 
                      =
          where they want it to manifest. It works off the 
               =
                 heterodyne principle. If you mix two ultrasonic 
         =
                       waves that differ one another in frequency then 
   =
                             if you add or subtract them together you get a=
 
                                beat frequency or alternate frequency. Fo=
r 
                                example, if a ghost is sending a signal =
at 54KHz 
                                and you have an electric fan in a=
 room creating 
                                an untrasonic frequency at =
45KHz then you will 
                                have a intermediate di=
fference frequency at 
                                9KHz, well with=
in human hearing range (20Hz to 
                                20KHz). Th=
is was just an example, but all 
                                electronic=
 equipment generates ultrasonic 
                                signals ju=
st by turning them on. From this 
                                theory I =
always felt that EVP were generated 
                                within=
 a few inches of the recorder.</div>
                                <div>&=
nbsp;</div>
                                <div>We are able to reproduce t=
his affect in not 
                                only radio with superhet=
erodyne systems but also 
                                with acoustics an=
d audio as in some passive 
                                sonars and a co=
mmercial produce called the 
                                "audio spotlig=
ht" by Dr. Joseph Pompeii.</div>
                                <div>&nbsp=
;</div>
                                <div>Frank R.<br><br>--- On <b>Mon,=
 6/8/09, Zack 
                                Widup <i><w9sz.zack@gmail=
. com></i></b> 
                                wrote:<br></div>

ir way in at the

he storage is made,
